body.name: Heyo.Ja Portable Baby Playard, 4 in 1 Convertible Pack and Play with Bassinet, Nursery Center with Comfortable Mattress, 5 Height Adjustable Bedside Crib (Grey)
features: 【Super Strong Bearing】: This baby playard is suitable for newborn babies ages 0-48 months and accompanies the growth of the baby.Second-layer bed can support about 44 pounds,playground model on the first floor can support 132 pounds. This crib is a basic style and does not include changing tables/mosquito net and other accessories.

【Unilateral Lifting】：We have designed 5 levels of up and down gears on the side close to the adult bed.You can adjust these 5 gears at any time. While preventing the baby from falling, it also allows the mother lying on the bed to pay attention to the child's condition at any time. On the side of the crib, we are also equipped with a tie that can connect the adult bed and the crib. Pressing one end of the tie that is close to the adult bed under the mattress prevent separation.

【Thoughtful design】：This crib has quilting mattress more breathable for kids to sleep more comfortably and softly.Surrounded by breathable mesh,it has large double pockets.You can put baby's diapers,toys or clothes in it.Game entrance, zipper method, convenient for babies to enter and exit under the bed to play！

【Easy to Assemble】：Just need simple 2 steps to install the baby bassinet effortlessly without tool required.This playard frame is easy to expand and can be completed by one person. There is a button on the crossbars on both sides of the bed. Press it to open the crossbars, and press it again to shrink back.

【Convenient】：Invisiable wheels with brakes, quitly move,makes it convenient transit from room to room. The luxurious starry sky crib comes with a convenient carrying bag, simply put it in the carrying bag and take it along. Is the best choice for going out to travel or move！

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Heyo.ja Our company has been committed to the development and production of baby furniture for so many years.When your newborn arrives, this bassinet cribs is the perfect choice during your baby's development .When used as a baby cradle, easy to reach over and soothe baby back to sleep, provide overnight feeding or do a quick diaper change. When used as a playpen, put it in playyard mode and move it anywhere inside or outside the house. It is suitable for newborn from 0 to 6 years old. At Heyo.ja, we strategically develop youth products aimed at helping parents and babies. Heyo.ja Portable Playard sporting a 3-in-1 design for baby’s safety and comfort and your ultimate convenience, a safer way to sleep and growthing with babies. It is also designed to help mothers liberate their hands and improve their exploration abilities. As the years passed,Heyo.ja Baby Playard became more and more popular with new parents. In order to make it easy for customers to install, it also developed free-tool installation design, its shape and form began to adapt into the various versions you see today. At the same time, Heyo.ja began to better grow .

Two bags enlarge: One side of the crib has two large pockets which can hold daily necessities such as baby diapers, wipes, toys etc. And it is very convenient for daily use. Invisible wheel: Invisible wheels on the cribs can move the playard convenient and help you push the crib more effortlessly. Carry bag: All models come with an outer pocket.When you need to travel or move. Can all in one carry bag after folding, easily carry out.

Strong bearing force: Heyo.ja baby playard bracket is all made of iron. Strong and durable. Second-layer bed can support about 44 pounds, playground model on the first floor can support 132 pounds. Suitable for babies from 0-48 months, accompanying children to grow. Game entrance: After removing the crossbars on the second floor, the first floor can become a place for babies to play. There is also a zippered play hole at the back of the crib. Baby can easily in&out by pulling zipper. 5 Height adjustable: Heyo.ja baby playard have handle adjustable height and 5 height adjustable. Height adjustable on one handle, easily look after baby even lying on bed. Five-level adjustment according to the height of the adult bed, which is more closely connected with the adult bed.
P.S. P508P is a luxurious style.Have a variety of accessories in addition to the basic bed. P508S as the basic model.It doesn’t bring some other accessories. Please choose carefully before buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old loves it...it's easy to put up and has different settings to use my son like to play in it. Can't wait to use it for bed to finally get some additional space. I like that it's not to wide but perfect size!! He can probably fit here until 5 or 6 yrs old

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Longest pack n play / Travel crib we have found
reviews.reviewText: We are traveling and needed a crib for a 2yo special needs boy who is about 38in long. He really does not fit in a pack N play anymore, its too short. I searched all around and found this was the longest (47 inches) portable/foldable crib. The set up was very easy, esp if you know pack n plays. We have not used it yet and I can't comment on durability. It looks pretty well made. Its the size of a pack N play when folded up, so I was certain it wouldn't be as long as stated, but it was! I wish we'd bought these instead, this is our last son and we have two others that got too long for pack n plays but we still needed to use them, they just had to sleep crunched up. The zipper door would have been awesome for our boys too. This is spendy -- esp because you can get used pack n plays free or cheaply on marketplaces. But if you need a longer pack n play -- I haven't seen any others that are this long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Big kids
reviews.reviewText: I needed something for my toddler with special needs. This was perfect Travels well and was big enough and low enough! It room forever to find a pack and play at the appropriate height.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is made very cheaply. The folding pad that your infant is supposed to lay on is basically cardboard like and the padding is very, very thin and there are spots on the boards where it feels like there is no padding at all. The entire product is poorly made. Also after putting this in my cart on Amazon they offered a thin mattress topper to go with the playpen. I purchased it as well, and low and behold, it’s too wide and too short for the playpen. I also purchased the matching sheets for the mattress topper. They too are useless to me. Now I have 3 different purchases to return because the descriptions were incorrect! Buyer beware!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Longer than normal play pens
reviews.reviewText: I wanted this for my 5 month old before he outgrows his bassinet. I ordered and it came and I was looking for weeks to find a mattress to go inside of it since the padding that comes with it is very thin. Couldn’t find one to fit it so I returned it. It’s was sturdy and looked great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very beautiful, rooming and so comfortable! My baby loves it , I’ll recommend it .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I forgot something with it the thing you put in the crib contact me as soon as possible

reviews.reviewerName: Val, Who Reads Reviews before Purchasing!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly What We Needed fire Our Gbaby
reviews.reviewText: I like that it’s longer than his last pack-n-play (pnp), it looks good, it’s easy to clean, it’s sturdy, and is long enough to fit him. He’s very tall for his age, which is why I searched for a new pnp.
